short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that allows users to make calls to an active softphone directly from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to simply click on the phone number(s) listed on any web page to initiate a call using GCF Softphone app installed on his/her computer. Using this extension requires a GCF Softphone access, which can be obtained from www.globalcallforwarding.com with an Outbound Calling service.
